game.name: Mining Wizards
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mining Wizards는 점진적으로 성장하는 채굴 인크리멘탈 게임입니다. 광물을 채굴하고, 재료를 모으고, 거대한 스킬 트리를 업그레이드하며, 레벨을 올려 재능을 해금하고, 유물을 발견하고, 유물 관람객을 끌어모으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mining Wizards is an incremental mining game. Mine minerals, gather materials, upgrade a massive skill tree, level up, unlock talents, discover artifacts, and attract artifact visitors!
